sec.p: To estimate recreational spearfishing catches, we multiplied the number of individual licenses obtained from the wilayas’ fisheries register, where one fisher gets one license, by the number of fishing days, assessed as 50 days·fisher -1·year -1, and the average daily weight of 20 kg·fisher -1·day -1 from [ 20]. We assumed both the CPUE and the number of fishing days remained constant over the 2011–2015 time period.
